masterFinding.verificationInstructions:
Verification Instructions:


Check that the session cookie is at least 20 characters long.

Reporting Requirements:


  1. Show authentication request and response - highlight the short session cookie Set-Cookie header
masterFinding.remediationInstructions: Use a session ID that is at least 20 characters in length and sufficiently random.
masterFinding.name: Weak Session Cookie - Insufficient Length
masterFinding.businessImpact: If valid session cookies can be brute forced, an attacker may be able to access sensitive information by hijacking other user's accounts.
masterFinding.description: Though it appears to be randomly generated, the session ID used by the application is relatively short and may be vulnerable to brute force attacks.
